settings.text:
PRODUCT WARRANTY

We guarantee that all of our products are free from manufacturing defects - any manufacturer defects are replaced at no cost to you.

FREE SHIPPING

We currently offer free shipping to the contigous states and sweden. See full terms here.

FREE EXCHANGES

If your clogs or sandals do not fit we will exchange them for free for U.S. customers. See full terms here.

FLEXIBLE FINANCING OPTIONS

Flexible financing offered by Shop Pay - see options at the next step.

settings.title: Have questions? Ask a Sandgrens expert
settings.text: Talk to a real person. No robots. Our team is here to answer all your Sandgrens questions. We are available Mon-Fri between 9:00 am - 4:00 pm CST.
